ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordTypeId = "0120g000000EAp7", OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Category__c ,"Development")&& OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"Personal Development") , ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"Cross Training")),
OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Category__c ,"Meeting")&& OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"Other")) ,
OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Category__c ,"Ongoing Projects")&& OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"Other")) ,
OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Category__c ,"Management Request/Escalation")&& OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"*Enterprise") , ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"*QEYE") , ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"*Audit") , ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"*Import"), ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"Other")),
OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Category__c ,"Enterprise")&& OR( ISPICKVAL( Timecard_Task__c ,"Other")))))))) &&
ISBLANK( Timing_Notes__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Timing Notes must not be blank
